---
title: "ASSOCIATE MEMBERS"
output: html_document
---
<br>

At present all ISEE global members that were born in a North American country or work for a North American Institution are automatically North American Chapter members. 

</br>

The current (2019) North American Chapter countries include: Bermuda, Canada, Greenland, and the United States of America.

</br>

North American Chapter members can self-elect to become Associate Chapter members. Associate
members will be more actively engaged in the action items listed above than regular NAC members.
